event.doc_name: Order and Findings on Sanctions and Motions

evidence.text: It is established that (a) throughout the class period, the City of Houston had a policy of not releasing warrantless arrestees who had not received neutral determinations of probable cause within the constitutionally required period of time
evidence.source_document: Order and Findings on Sanctions and Motions

add_extracted.value: City must release warrantless arrestees within the constitutionally required period (48 hours) without requiring probable cause determination

evidence.text: SIGNED on this 30th day of August, 2018.

add_extracted.value: Ongoing: Compliance with constitutional time limits for warrantless arrestees
